document.manualTocDescription: This document has limited content, so the table of contents has been manually enabled. You can disable it anytime.

detail.documentListDescription: Browse and manage documents in the repository

users.subtitle: Manage system user accounts and permissions

messages.updateFailedDescription: An error occurred while updating repository information

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete Repository
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete repository "{{name}}"?
deleteDialog.warning: This action is irreversible and will delete the repository and all its document data.

detail.deleteRepositoryWarning: This action will permanently delete the repository and all its data. This action cannot be undone.
detail.selectDocumentDescription: Select a document from the left directory to view or edit its content
detail.syncManagementDescription: Manage repository sync settings and history
detail.syncDescription: This will pull the latest files from the source repository and regenerate documents.
detail.permissionManagementDescription: Manage user and role access permissions for this repository
detail.configManagementDescription: Manage various configuration options for the repository
detail.taskManagementDescription: View and manage repository-related processing tasks
detail.editRepositoryDescription: Modify basic repository information and sync settings
detail.enableAutoSyncDescription: When enabled, the system will automatically sync repository updates

aiGenerateDialog.title: AI Generate Document Content
aiGenerateDialog.description: Generate content for the currently selected document directory. You can enter a custom prompt to guide AI generation, or leave it blank to use the default prompt.
aiGenerateDialog.promptPlaceholder: e.g.: Generate detailed technical documentation with code examples and architecture explanation...
aiGenerateDialog.promptHint: Tip: Leave blank to use the system default prompt or previously saved prompt

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete role "{{name}}"?

chart.description: View token usage across different time periods
chart.noDataDescription: Token usage data will be displayed after activity

operationDistribution.description: Token usage by different operation types

settings.description: Configure and manage various system features and settings
settings.resetGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings in this group to default values?
settings.restartRequiredMessage: Some settings changes require a system restart to take effect
settings.restartConfirmMessage: System restart may take a few minutes. Are you sure you want to continue?

ui.title: Settings
ui.accountInfoDesc: Manage your personal profile and basic information
ui.securitySettingsDesc: Manage your account security and password settings
ui.preferencesDesc: Customize your application experience and notification preferences
ui.changePasswordDesc: Regularly changing your password helps protect your account security. Make sure to use a strong password.
ui.appSettingsDesc: Manage your application preferences and notification options
ui.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive important updates and notification emails
ui.confirmDeleteAvatarDesc: Are you sure you want to delete your current avatar? This action cannot be undone.
ui.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF formats, file size not exceeding 2MB
ui.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters and numbers

settings.basicDescription: Configure basic website information including name, logo, description, etc.
settings.emailDescription: Configure SMTP mail server for sending system notification emails
settings.aiDescription: Configure AI models and API settings for code analysis and documentation generation
settings.storageDescription: Configure file storage, upload limits, cloud storage and other settings
settings.securityDescription: Configure password policies, session management, IP access control and other security settings
settings.documentDescription: Configure document processing, code analysis and repository processing settings
settings.thirdPartyDescription: Configure {{platform}} OAuth integration and API access settings

basic.siteLogoPlaceholder: Enter logo URL or upload image
basic.analyticsCodePlaceholder: Enter Google Analytics or other tracking code
basic.analyticsCodeHelp: Supports Google Analytics, Baidu Analytics and other third-party tracking codes

email.securityNoteDescription: Email password and other sensitive information will be encrypted and stored. Please ensure SMTP server configuration is correct
email.maxEmailsPerHourHelp: Limit the number of emails the system sends per hour
email.emailTemplatePlaceholder: HTML email template with variable replacement support
email.emailTemplateHelp: Supports HTML format, use {{variable_name}} for replacement
email.defaultTestBody: This is a test email to verify the email configuration is working correctly.
email.testNoteDescription: The test email will be sent to the specified address using current configuration. Please ensure the configuration information is correct

ai.testRequiredFields: Please configure API endpoint and key first
ai.apiKeyNoteDescription: API keys are sensitive information and will be encrypted and stored
ai.presencePenaltyHelp: Encourage discussion of new topics, -2.0 to 2.0
ai.customBodyParamsHelp: Add custom parameters to all AI model API requests
ai.customBodyParamsNote: These parameters will be automatically added to all AI API request bodies. Supports string, number, and boolean types. Restart service required after modification.
ai.mem0Help: Mem0 is a memory management system that helps AI remember previous conversations
ai.testDescription: Test if current configuration can connect to AI service normally
ai.testNoteDescription: Test will send a simple request to AI service to verify connection and authentication

storage.fileStoragePathHelp: Ensure the path exists and has read/write permissions
storage.maxFileSizeHelp: Maximum size limit for individual files
storage.storageTiersHelp: Select default storage tier for files
storage.cloudStorageConfigHelp: Enter corresponding configuration information for selected provider
storage.tip1: Regularly clean up expired temporary files and logs
storage.tip2: Enable compression for large files to save space
storage.tip3: Move infrequently accessed files to cold storage
storage.tip4: Set reasonable file upload size limits

security.securityNoteDescription: Security settings affect all users' access, please modify with caution
security.sessionTimeoutHelp: Auto logout time after user inactivity
security.twoFactorAuthHelp: Add an extra security layer for user accounts
security.twoFactorAuthEnabledDescription: Users can configure two-factor authentication in their personal settings
security.allowedIpHelp: Only these IP addresses can access the system
security.allowedIpDescription: Leave empty to allow all IP access
security.blockedIpHelp: These IP addresses will be denied access
security.blockedIpDescription: Blacklist has higher priority than whitelist
security.captchaConfigHelp: Enter corresponding configuration information for selected provider
security.tip5: Monitor system logs and abnormal activities

thirdParty.setupNoteDescription: Before using {{platform}} integration, you need to create an OAuth application on {{platform}}
thirdParty.enableOAuthHelp: Allow users to log in with {{platform}} accounts
thirdParty.allowedOrganizationsHelp: Restrict access to only members of these organizations
thirdParty.allowedOrganizationsDescription: Leave empty to allow all users
thirdParty.enableAutoSyncHelp: Automatically sync repository information and permissions
thirdParty.defaultRepositoryHelp: Default repository access permissions for new users
thirdParty.callbackUrlsDescription: Configure the following callback URLs in your OAuth application settings
thirdParty.step2: Copy Client ID and Client Secret

document.enableIncrementalUpdateHelp: Only process changed files to improve efficiency
document.maxFileReadCountHelp: Maximum number of files to process at once
document.defaultLanguageHelp: Default programming language for documents and code
document.enableSmartFilterHelp: AI intelligently identifies and filters irrelevant files
document.smartFilterNote: Smart filtering can automatically identify configuration files, dependencies, etc. that don't need processing
document.excludedFilesHelp: These files will be skipped during processing
document.excludedFoldersHelp: These folders will be skipped during processing
document.enableCodeCompressionHelp: Compress code content to save storage space
document.enableWarehouseFunctionPromptTaskHelp: Generate function descriptions and usage prompts for repositories
document.enableFileCommitHelp: Automatically commit file changes after processing
document.enableWarehouseCommitHelp: Automatically commit repository changes after processing
document.refineAndEnhanceQualityHelp: Use AI to optimize document quality and readability
document.tip1: Enable smart filtering to significantly improve processing speed
document.tip2: Set reasonable exclusion rules for files and folders
document.readMaxTokensHelp: Maximum token limit per AI request (1000-200000)
document.proxyHelp: HTTP/HTTPS proxy for Git operations, format: http://proxy:port
document.enableAgentToolHelp: Enable Agent tool plugin to enhance functionality, provides deep thinking planning by default
document.tip3: Adjust max read tokens based on repository size and AI model limits
document.tip4: Regularly clean up failed processing tasks

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.exportNoteDescription: Exported settings files do not contain sensitive information such as passwords and API keys
importExport.importNoteDescription: Importing settings will overwrite existing configurations. Please backup important settings first.
importExport.selectGroupsDescription: Select setting groups to export, leave empty to export all
importExport.dragFileHere: Click or drag file here to upload
importExport.selectFileFirst: Please select a file to import first
importExport.securityTip1: Only import settings files from trusted sources
importExport.securityTip2: Carefully check settings content before importing
importExport.securityTip3: Sensitive information will not be exported and needs to be reconfigured
importExport.securityTip4: It is recommended to restart the system after import to ensure configuration takes effect
